article_title: Kentucky Democrats balance hope, concern as they look to the future
article_text: After an Election Night of decidedly mixed results, Kentucky Democrats pondering the future of their party divide their prospects into two categories — state and federal races. Or put another way, hope and despair.

article_summary:
After an Election Night of decidedly mixed results, Kentucky Democrats pondering the future of their party divide their prospects into two categories — state and federal races.
Or put another way, hope and despair.
